verbose_text: For example, the rus operon, which contains genes coding for the blue copper protein rusticyanin and several cytochromes, mediates ferrous oxidation in iron oxidizing acidithiobacilli and, seemingly, in the salt-tolerant gammaproteobacterium " T. prosperous ".
evidence: rus operon, which contains genes coding for the blue copper protein rusticyanin and several cytochromes, mediates ferrous oxidation in iron
